channel.title: amanda palmer on Paul Cutler

item.title: What is the future business model for the music industry?
item.description: What is the future business model for the music industry? The Oatmeal has done a comic on what it has been and what it should be. Go read it now – and don’t worry, it’s Amanda Palmer approved. If there is one person single handedly trying to change how business is done, she’s it.
